homeinfo.title: About Us
homeinfo.aboutus: Summtin' Yummy is a start up bakery that was just created about 1 year ago. It was started as a mock bakery just for the founder Jeffrey Lobo to get expericence in how the real companies work. It has always been a dream for Jeffrey to start his own bakery since he was a kid. He has always been talented in making all sorts of desserts but now he is speciallizing in macaroons. He makes all sort of macaroons with a variety of flavors.
